name: Sportarr
description: Sports metadata provider for Jellyfin. Fetches rich metadata, posters, banners, and artwork for sports events from Sportarr.
overview: Automatically enriches your sports library with metadata from Sportarr including event descriptions, air dates, posters, banners, and thumbnails. Supports multi-part fighting events (Early Prelims, Prelims, Main Card) and motorsport sessions.

versions.changelog: Initial release with series, episode, and image providers
